name: Famicom Mini: Mario Bros.
storyline: The story of this game revolves around two plumbers, Mario and Luigi, who are working in the sewers of New York. The sewers are overrun by waves of enemies and the Mario Bros. have to defeat the enemies and collect coins to receive their pay.
summary: Famicom Mini: Mario Bros. is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo It is a remake of the Famicom game Mario Bros. (note: not its arcade incarnation), and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.
